track.name: On The Run
comments: EPIC
The only Floyd covers I've ever liked! (There is one song on the album i don't but...) It's a mean feat to cover a band as masterful as Floyd and do a good job.
Nobody does Floyd better........on this one, not even PINK!
This is Floyd in mega reggae.
Now this is what I'm talking about. This is the most killer album!!!! And I'm a Floyd Freak!

This is a very sick cover. I was wondering how they where going to tackle this one before I heard it. I thought they were just going to ad a skank or something, but my mind was so completely blown when the amen break started. Love that they also touch upon this part of dub / UK culture.
@Daveemincle: It wasnt the Floyd original was it? or did Yoko do a reworking?
This track reminds me A LOT the Breakcore's drum patterns, and that's why I like this so fuccen much.
@Odyson: Yoko and the Seatbelts had actually covered this one from Pink Floyd.
like
sounds like some music from cowboy bebop
now this is good shhhhtt

I love this track, album and dvd.....this is more of a ragga/jungle track which makes it incredible sick. No reason to be hatin' on this track at all.
pink floyd rip right off the bat.
